title: The Thing (PC) playthrough — Part 1
description: This game enticed me because of the interesting AI especially for a 2001 game. Your companions have trust meters and won't follow you if they don't trust you, they'll go crazy, get infected, not trust other people in your group, etc. It's really neat, and the game itself is also pretty fun. Gives Alien vs Predator Marine campaign vibes a lot of the time, which is great.
